text: HC Dobrudja is a men's handball club from Dobrich, Bulgaria, that plays in the GHR A, the highest level handball league in Bulgaria. ==European record == {| class="wikitable" ! Season ! Competition ! Round ! Club ! 1st leg ! 2nd leg !
